_header: Masters that war of crafts seres
Subjects: utilitarian instructions; lucky and unlucky days
_description: A poem on Lucky and Unlucky Days — 90 lines in couplets

BodAddA106.First Lines:
Maysters þat war of craftes sersNumbers dayes monethes &
                    ȝersþat is to wete in a twylmouthTwa & twynty dayes er
                    selcouth…
BodAddA106.Last Lines:
…To born so says þe prophecyThurght euyle ded þai
                    sall dy
BodAddA106.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope,
                        ed.  
             Secular Lyrics of the XIV and XV Centuries.
         2nd ed. Oxford: Clarendon, 1955: 69-70.
